.. _coil_fies:

Coil Models Included in SimNIBS
==================================


.. list-table::
   :widths: 40 40
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Coil Name
     - File Names
   * - Magstim 70mm Figure-of-Eight
     - Magstim_70mm_Fig8.ccd Magstim_70mm_Fig8.nii.gz
   * - MagVenture MC B70
     - MagVenture_MC_B70.ccd MagVenture_MC_B70.nii.gz
